title: Home
description: As one of the top free clinics in Southern California, Family Health Centers of San Diego offers low-cost health services to the uninsured.
sitename: Family Health Centers of San Diego
cleaned_text: learn more](/medi-cal/#reapply)How May We Help You? Find a Clinic Find a Service Founded in 1970, Family Health Centers of San Diego is dedicated to providing caring, affordable, high-quality health care and supportive services to everyone, with a special commitment to uninsured, low-income and medically underserved persons. Services Prevention & Treatment Mpox Information While the risk of mpox (previously known as monkeypox) to most people remains low, the mpox vaccine is available for San Diego residents who are at risk. Both the County of San Diego and FHCSD have a limited supply of the mpox vaccine available. Call 211 to see if you are eligible and make an appointment. [Learn More](https://www.fhcsd.org/monkeypox/) We offer COVID-19 Vaccinations Anyone five years of age or older who lives or works in San Diego County can schedule COVID-19 vaccination appointments at any one of our vaccination sites. Call [(619) 515-2474](tel:6195152474) to make an appointment! [Find a Clinic](/vaccination-sites/) Telehealth Appointments Non-Emergency Care You can continue to receive affordable, high-quality health care through phone calls or interactive videos with your provider for many of our services. Call [(619) 515-2300](tel:6195152300) to schedule your appointment or fill out our
